title: The Gypsy Recipe
full_text:
The Gypsy Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Total
5 mins
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
2
ounces
vodka
1
ounce
Benedictine
1
dash
Angostura
bitters
Directions
Combine ingredients in a mixing glass and fill with ice. Stir well to chill, and strain into chilled cocktail glass. Twist a piece of lemon peel over the drink and use as garnish.
